page.title: 03A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content:
After breakfast I go to school on the school bus. When we get there we have sums on the board and do more maths after these. We have play for 15 minutes and I play with Henry the rabbit. After play we do more maths or English until lunch. I have a packed lunch. The next play is the longest one. The afternoon play is the shortest one and lasts for 10 minutes. We have the register again in the afternoon and 30 minutes of quiet reading and we might read or talk about our books to our teacher. The we do Art, P.E. Music or Topic. We finish with a story and go home at 3.10 At home I help Mum with my new baby sister.
